## Description {#details}

This file provides the interface for the instcombine pass implementation.

The interface is used for generic transformations in this folder and target specific combinations in the targets. The visitor implementation is in <code>InstCombinerImpl</code> in <code><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instcombine/instcombineinternal-h">InstCombineInternal.h</a></code>.

<SectionDefinition>

</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the source operand of a potentially bitcasted value while</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#aa1eeea37af7eeec30772c649d25cd1ba"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#aa1eeea37af7eeec30772c649d25cd1ba">peekThroughBitcast</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OneUseOnly = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Assign a complexity or rank value to LLVM Values. This is used to reduce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the amount of pattern matching needed for compares and commutative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions. For example, if we have:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   icmp ugt X, Constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   xor (add X, Constant), cast Z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We do not have to consider the commuted variants of these patterns because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// canonicalization based on complexity guarantees the above ordering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This routine maps IR values to various complexity ranks:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   0 -&gt; undef</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   1 -&gt; Constants</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   2 -&gt; Cast and (f)neg/not instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   3 -&gt; Other instructions and arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a2f79a062519c0854b4b97bbceac77997"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a2f79a062519c0854b4b97bbceac77997">getComplexity</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(V))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;UndefValue&gt;</a>(V) ? 0 : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;CastInst&gt;</a>(V) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(V, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a5d295dcffba83c3c5a17d2fb3273b434">m&#95;Neg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">PatternMatch::m&#95;Value</a>())) ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a4ffe5454cf09255ace0804d9c8044004"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a4ffe5454cf09255ace0804d9c8044004">shouldAvoidAbsorbingNotIntoSelect</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a ? b : false and a ? true : b are the canonical form of logical and/or.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This includes !a ? b : false and !a ? true : b. Absorbing the not into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the select by swapping operands would break recognition of this pattern</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in other analyses, so don&#39;t do that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2276d81e0e6e31d0a69c4352a066ef73">PatternMatch::m&#95;LogicalAnd</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">PatternMatch::m&#95;Value</a>(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return nonnull value if V is free to invert under the condition of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// WillInvertAllUses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If Builder is nonnull, it will return a simplified ~V.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If Builder is null, it will return an arbitrary nonnull value (not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dereferenceable).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If the inversion will consume instructions, &#96;DoesConsume&#96; will be set to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// true. Otherwise it will be false.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if the specified value is free to invert (apply ~ to).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This happens in cases where the ~ can be eliminated.  If WillInvertAllUses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is true, work under the assumption that the caller intends to remove all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// uses of V and only keep uses of ~V.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// See also: canFreelyInvertAllUsersOf()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a1f819cdc746560fd28977b1175030cff"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a1f819cdc746560fd28977b1175030cff">isFreeToInvert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WillInvertAllUses,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;DoesConsume) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#af11b32adde24fea55878e66dd7139362">getFreelyInverted</a>(V, WillInvertAllUses, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Builder&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             DoesConsume) != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a18727b52ba4b34ed267df9b3cfa6c407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a18727b52ba4b34ed267df9b3cfa6c407">isFreeToInvert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WillInvertAllUses) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Unused;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a1f819cdc746560fd28977b1175030cff">isFreeToInvert</a>(V, WillInvertAllUses, Unused);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Given i1 V, can every user of V be freely adapted if V is changed to !V ?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// InstCombine&#39;s freelyInvertAllUsersOf() must be kept in sync with this fn.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// NOTE: for Instructions only!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// See also: isFreeToInvert()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#ab0cf90f56e055b09227ab0f84acc4083"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#ab0cf90f56e055b09227ab0f84acc4083">canFreelyInvertAllUsersOf</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;IgnoredUser) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at every user of V.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &amp;U : V-&gt;uses()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (U.getUser() == IgnoredUser)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t consider this user.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(U.getUser());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOpcode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Select:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (U.getOperandNo() != 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only if the value is used as select cond.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a4ffe5454cf09255ace0804d9c8044004">shouldAvoidAbsorbingNotIntoSelect</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SelectInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Br:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(U.getOperandNo() == 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Must be branching on that value.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Free to invert by swapping true/false values/destinations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Xor: </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can invert &#39;xor&#39; if it&#39;s a &#39;not&#39;, by ignoring</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#ae28f9cbf5b5e3fbeb69d1414285c1760">m&#95;Not</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">PatternMatch::m&#95;Value</a>())))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Not a &#39;not&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t know, likely not freely invertible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So far all users were free to invert...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can freely invert all users!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Some binary operators require special handling to avoid poison and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// undefined behavior. If a constant vector has undef elements, replace those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// undefs with identity constants if possible because those are always safe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to execute. If no identity constant exists, replace undef with some other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// safe constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#acf9cbfcb493b0042022c94230e9350e2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#acf9cbfcb493b0042022c94230e9350e2">getSafeVectorConstantForBinop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ac26154a24f393f523c87cc5f8239f36c">BinaryOperator::BinaryOps</a> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;In,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsRHSConstant) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsRHSConstant) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::SRem: </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X % 1 = 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::URem: </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X %u 1 = 0</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Inserts an instruction \\p New before instruction \\p Old</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Also adds the new instruction to the worklist and returns \\p New so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it is suitable for use as the return from the visitation patterns.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a46f1e493b5d0822af6344aa294f93fdb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a46f1e493b5d0822af6344aa294f93fdb">InsertNewInstBefore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;New, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> Old) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(New &amp;&amp; !New-&gt;getParent() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;New instruction already inserted into a basic block!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    New-&gt;insertBefore(Old); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert inst</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a7b93340fbcab35a38a04bf49aa3113a0">Worklist</a>.add(New);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> New;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Same as InsertNewInstBefore, but also sets the debug loc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a7ce29ca36c91b8c790b0f8b2560c3033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a7ce29ca36c91b8c790b0f8b2560c3033">InsertNewInstWith</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;New, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> Old) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A combiner-aware RAUW-like routine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This method is to be used when an instruction is found to be dead,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// replaceable with another preexisting expression. Here we add all uses of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// I to the worklist, replace all uses of I with the new value, then return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// I, so that the inst combiner will know that I was modified.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a49f1bd0bdf0ef741bdd714cc1188d7c5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a49f1bd0bdf0ef741bdd714cc1188d7c5">replaceInstUsesWith</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are no uses to replace, then we return nullptr to indicate that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// no changes were made to the program.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.use&#95;empty()) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a7b93340fbcab35a38a04bf49aa3113a0">Worklist</a>.pushUsersToWorkList(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add all modified instrs to worklist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are replacing the instruction with itself, this must be in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// segment of unreachable code, so just clobber the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == V)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      V = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/poisonvalue/#a1bf08613fb664a2e377a9a72c59a6b66">PoisonValue::get</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;IC: Replacing &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;    with &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;V &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"></CodeLine>
